title: Dieterist Watch Face
summary: Watch faces inspired by Dieter Rams
description: Watch faces inspired by Dieter Rams in three variants - OG, MG and Mod.To select a watch face variant, long-press on the watch face, select the gear icon, and scroll and tap the variant you want.
descriptionHTML:
Watch faces inspired by Dieter Rams in three variants - OG, MG and Mod.

To select a watch face variant, long-press on the watch face, select the gear icon, and scroll and tap the variant you want.
comments: A beautiful and simple watch face that actually looks like a watch face. Looks great on my LG Watch Style. No fuss and easy to read the time.
6 gets cut off on 360 I'd be fine with the 6 being removed for moto 360 watches
Looks great. Would be nice to have a Moto 360 specific face though that didn't cut off the 6 at the bottom. Maybe just move it up or remove it?
Looks good.  Maybe add a small digital or day of the week
Good face Very nice but would be better if had more info on face like battery level
